amendment.description: To include in the veterans' reserve fund services for low-vision and blinded veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 615 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 615 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S3673-3677; text: CR S 3674) To include in the veterans' reserve fund services for low-vision and blinded veterans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 615 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Kerry.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 615 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
